snippet: Two officers were shot and the gunman was killed at a subway station in Brooklyn, about an hour after another officer was shot during a robbery attempt in the Bronx.
abstract: Three New York City Police officers, Michael Levay, Lukasz Kozicki, and Juan Pichardo, are shot in two separate encounters, including one at Brooklyn subway station that leaves the gunman dead; other incident is robbery attempt in the Bronx.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and WENDY RUDERMAN
byline.contributor: Christopher Maag and Angela Macropoulos contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Two officers were shot and the gunman was killed at a subway station in Brooklyn, about an hour after another officer was shot during a robbery attempt in the Bronx.

headline.seo: 3 New York Police Officers Are Wounded in 2 Separate Shootings
headline.main: 3 Officers Are Wounded in 2 Shootings; a Gunman Is Killed
headline.print_headline: 3 Officers Are Wounded in 2 Shootings; a Gunman Is Killed
